mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.country_code as t_country_code, t.language_code as t_language_code, t.original as t_original, t.roman as t_roman, t.match_way as t_match_way, t.match_params as t_match_params, t.chinese as t_chinese
mapper.insert: insert into ct_transliteration (id, country_code, language_code, original, roman, match_way, match_params, chinese) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{matchParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chinese,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ct_transliteration
id,
country_code,
language_code,
original,
roman,
match_way,
match_params,
chinese,

mapper.update:
update ct_transliteration
country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language_code = #{languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original = #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roman = #{roman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
match_way = #{matchWay,jdbcType=CHAR},
match_params = #{matchParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chinese = #{chinese,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ct_transliteration set country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language_code = #{languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original = #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roman = #{roman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, match_way = #{matchWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, match_params = #{matchParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chinese = #{chinese,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into ct_transliteration (country_code, language_code, original, roman, match_way, match_params, chinese) values
(#{item.countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.languageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.matchWay,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.matchParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.chinese,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
